title: Create Islamic app with Quran, festival dates, and prayer times

requirements.text: Display Quran text with surah (chapter) navigation, allowing users to browse and read all 114 surahs with Arabic text and translations
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select and view any of the 114 surahs
Translation is provided alongside Arabic text

requirements.text: Show a calendar of major Muslim festival dates including Eid al-Fitr, Eid al-Adha, Ramadan start and end dates, and other significant Islamic holidays with Hijri calendar dates
acceptanceCriteria: Display upcoming Islamic holidays with both Gregorian and Hijri dates
Include at minimum: Eid al-Fitr, Eid al-Adha, Ramadan dates
Festival information is visible in a clear calendar or list format

requirements.text: Provide daily prayer times (azan) for the five obligatory prayers (Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha) based on user location or selected city
acceptanceCriteria: Display times for all five daily prayers
Allow users to select their location or city
Prayer times update based on the current date
Times are displayed in a clear, readable format

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with Islamic-inspired aesthetics using elegant geometric patterns, calligraphic elements, and a warm color palette (gold, emerald green, deep teal) that creates a reverent and peaceful atmosphere throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color scheme applied across all pages
Typography choices reflect elegance and readability
Layout includes subtle Islamic geometric or arabesque patterns
Overall design conveys respect and tranquility

constraints: Quran text must be accurate and respectful
Prayer times must be calculated correctly based on geographic location
Islamic dates follow the Hijri calendar system
nonGoals: Multiple translation options beyond one default translation

required: Islamic geometric pattern background with gold and emerald tones, subtle and elegant (islamic-pattern-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Crescent moon and star icon in gold color for app branding (crescent-icon.dim_256x256.png)
